com.illcode.meterman.event

Interface EntitySelectionListener


  • public interface EntitySelectionListener
    A listener that will be notified when an entity is selected in the UI.

    This can be used, for example, to set entity images in the UI, or to manage puzzles that involve selecting different entities in a certain order.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean entitySelected(Entity e)
      Called when an entity is selected.

    • Method Detail

      • entitySelected

        boolean entitySelected(Entity e)
        Called when an entity is selected.

        Note that it is called after the UI is updated as normal for that entity, so that the listener can modify it if desired.
        Parameters:
        e - selected entity
        Returns:
        true if other selection listeners should be skipped, false to continue processing.
